- Location: Exterior stucco wall beneath a second-story window; side yard area.
- Material/condition: Rough-textured stucco with wood window trim; minor paint wear and small crack/peel near right side of wall.
- Window: Double-hung sash; trim painted white; bottom sill shows wear—possible minor rot if not sealed.
- Electrical: Exposed cables and a small electrical box mounted on wall; wires are not secured in conduit or weatherproofing.
- Plumbing: Exterior hose bib/pipe with a corroded elbow; appears aged—check for leaks and winterization.
